channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Home
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Home

item.title: Project III: Intro to Alteryx
item.description: Alteryx is a very powerful tool especially when it comes to combining different programs to work together.

item.title: Project II: Hotel Cancellation
item.description: In this project, my objective is to see if it’s possible to predict when a booking is likely to be cancelled. This is essential as this will aid hotels in minimizing the amount of cancellations by marketing to guests that are likely to cancel. In turn, this will result in a better bottom line in their income statement. Engineered features from the characteristics of bookings Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model.

item.title: Project I: Salary Prediction
item.description: Created a tool that estimates data science salaries (MAE ~ $ 11K) to help data scientists negotiate their income when they get a job. Scraped over 1000 job descriptions from glassdoor using python and selenium Engineered features from the text of each job description to quantify the value companies put on python, excel, aws, and spark. Optimized Linear, Lasso, and Random Forest Regressors using GridsearchCV to reach the best model.
